name: MATTHEW TREVINO
professional_summary: Systems Architect and Operations Professional with over 15 years of experience in logistics, dispatch operations, and IT automation. Proven expertise in optimizing transportation networks, managing fleet operations, and ensuring compliance with industry standards. Adept at leveraging technology to streamline processes, reduce downtime, and maintain high on-time delivery rates. Strong background in customer service, inventory management, and cross-functional collaboration with carriers, suppliers, and clients.

responsibilities: Managed a fleet of 20+ drivers with 60+ daily outbound shipments to major retailers (Walmart, Costco).
Designed and implemented a custom scheduling system reducing downtime by 30% and improving fleet utilization.
Maintained 99% on-time delivery rate through rigorous planning, driver management, and compliance with DOT regulations.
Managed brokerage operations with a network of 500+ carriers, negotiating rates and ensuring P&L accountability.
Automated load tracking and invoicing workflows, increasing operational efficiency by 25%.
Led integration of TMS and CRM software to modernize account management and carrier relations.
Provided LTL/FTL transportation solutions for shippers, coordinating with dispatch/ops teams to ensure timely delivery.
Demonstrated attention to detail in tracking shipments and resolving client issues.
Executed high-volume last-mile deliveries with a 4.9+ performance rating.
Optimized routes using geographic knowledge and real-time problem-solving for complex delivery windows.
